detail_desc: All-in-one suit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Short skirt in sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, pockets in the side seams and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Fully lined printed bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a plastic fastener at the back.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a decorative satin knot bow, zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size approx. 4x13x16 cm.
Fitted, rib-knit top with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Jersey cycling shorts with a high waist with covered elastication.

Short, straight-cut tunic in soft, washed denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend. Collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, button placket and flap chest pockets. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Trainers in imitation suede and crocodile-patterned imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a short gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, draped skirt. Lined.
Woven scarf with a soft, brushed finish and fringe trims on the short sides. Size 60x200 cm.
Ballet pumps with a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.
Fishnet tights with an elasticated waist.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and straight legs with creases.

Flying jacket in imitation leather with a pile collar that can be fastened at the front with tabs and metal buckles. Zip down the front, side pockets and adjustable tabs with metal buckles at the sides. Pile lining.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hooded jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a contrasting colour button placket and a kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist. Ties and decorative metal rings at the sides.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit bamboo blend with wide elastication at the tops.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Playsuit in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and hem. Press-stud on one shoulder.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage with decorative lacing at the back.
Fitted jacket in a sturdy, textured-weave wool blend with frayed edges. Notch lapels, welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the front and cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with flounce trims at the top that continue over the shoulders, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
3/4-length leggings in soft stretch fabric with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
V-neck body in ribbed jersey with narrow tie-top shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a detachable braided imitation suede belt, short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long nightshirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with buttons at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves, narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long sweatshirt in a cotton blend with a flock print, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a round neck and rounded hem.
Fishnet tights with an elasticated waist.
Necklace with three metal chains in different lengths, one with a drop-shaped pendant and one with a bar-shaped pendant. Adjustable length.
Slip-on leather trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Elasticated scrunchie in grained imitation leather.
Boots with lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Short blouse in airy chiffon with a square neckline at the front, covered buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Partly lined.
Glasses with plastic frames and clear lenses.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back. Double layer at the top.
Large earrings in metal and plastic with a round disc and rectangular pendants. Length approx. 8.5 cm.
5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a zip fly with a button and straight, wide legs with a zip at the hem. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Cap in sequined mesh with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back and lining in a cotton weave.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
A-line skirt in soft cotton corduroy with two press-studs at the top and decorative buttons down the front.

Knee-length dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a scallop-edged stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Short, scallop-edged sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared, pleated skirt. Unlined.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in mesh with a frill trim at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Smocking at the waist and a skirt with smocking and a flounced hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.
Jacket in soft, fluffy faux fur with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a low crotch and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets, pleats at the top, and tapered legs.
Scarf in an airy patterned weave.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a crinkled weave. Short sleeves with smocking and a frill trim, decorative ties at the front and elastication around the top and hem.
Top in an airy, printed viscose weave with a yoke, button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with two flounces.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and ties at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Off-the-shoulder, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a frill and silicone trim at the top, and support panels and wide elastication in the sides. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline, short sleeves and covered, decorative buttons at the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Longer jacket in woven fabric with flap welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.
Trousers in cotton-blend slub jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, gently tapered legs, side pockets and ribbed hems. Regular fit.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
T-shirt in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, raw edges around the sleeves and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar in a contrasting colour, a zip down the front, flap chest pockets with press-studs, zipped front pockets and a pocket with a flap and press-stud on one sleeve. Gently gathered seam at the back, and contrasting colour ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Two flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved cardigan in stretch imitation suede with a shawl collar and straight-cut hem. No buttons.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with decorations. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
